fields.name: TOTAL AUDIÊNCIAS
fields.code:
from lawsuit.models import Folder
from task.models import Task
from random import randint

folders = Folder.objects.filter(person_customer__company=self.company)
tasks = Task.objects.filter(movement__folder__in=folders, type_task__is_audience=True)

result = {
	'title': 'TOTAL DE AUDIÊNCIAS', 
  	'subtitle': 'Audiências no Ezlayer', 
  	'value': tasks.count(), 
  	'percent': 100
}

fields.name: AUDIÊNCIAS NO MÊS
fields.code:
from django.utils import timezone
from task.models import Task
from lawsuit.models import Folder

folders = Folder.objects.filter(person_customer__company=self.company)
tasks_this_month = Task.objects.filter(
   movement__folder__in=folders, 
   final_deadline_date__year=timezone.now().year,
   final_deadline_date__month=timezone.now().month
 )

tasks_older_month = Task.objects.filter(
   movement__folder__in=folders, 
   final_deadline_date__year=timezone.now().year,
   final_deadline_date__month=timezone.now().month -1
 )

difference = tasks_this_month.count() - tasks_older_month.count()
percent = (difference.__abs__() / tasks_older_month.count()) * 100
direction = 'down'


if (tasks_older_month.count() < tasks_this_month.count()):
  direction = 'up'
  
result = {
	'title': 'AUDIÊNCIAS NESTE MÊS', 
  	'subtitle': get_month(), 
  	'value': tasks_this_month.count(), 
  	'percent': '%0.2f' %percent,
    'direction': direction  	
}
